title: Remove close-window-button or remove the whole tab part in fullscreen without GNOME topbar
content: Is there any way to remove the close-window-button or the whole tab part. I want to avoid the user close the browser. I know there is Kiosk mode, but kiosk mode seems cannot keep back button

title: about opening word files(*.doc)
content: When opening word files(*.doc) on the server with Firefox browser, it is very slow, but other browsers open word very quickly. Is this a bug in the design of the firebox browser?

title: Firefox tab crash

Firefox on Linux Mint 20.1, tab crashes when trying to login into Google.

Updated Firefox and cleared cache / cookies.
creator: paulgureghian

title: Can't add bookmarks
content: Hi guys~ for some reasons I can't add bookmarks on my firefox browsers. At first, the marked webpage will only show names but not the link, when i click on the bookmarks that i saved it won't direct me to page. Now even worse, the bookmark function doesn't work at all. I tried restore all my settings and redownloaded firefox three times, it's always the same problem. Also the history function doesn't store my current browsing history at all. I 100% sure I didn't change anything at the privacy section.
creator: xchristina5945

title: Comments are unstable when viewing nicovideo.jp in firefox
content: The same problem also occurs with firefox (fennec) v86.0 on Android It did not happen with chromium v89.0.4389.128
creator: alice_anon

title: Trouble restoring firefox from backup
content:
Hi,

After losing my session history and bookmarks from using firefox's "forget last 5 minutes" feature on accident, I used shadowcopyview to create a backup of my old profile. Now, after two reinstalls, I still cannot recover my session or bookmarks, even when replacing the old profile entirely.

JeffersonCher's wonderful scrounger has helped me to recover from a similiar blunder in the past, but this time, attempting to recover the session from a recovery file gave me 3 websites I haven't visited in 2 years and an error message when attempting to recover the bookmarks.

Anything you can provide would be a big help: I am very confused on how to really proceed.

Thanks!
creator: Pendragonchen1

title: Firefox Default Browser very slow to come up.
content: Firefox is my default browser but it takes FOREVER (5-10 minutes) to come up. I have refreshed several times but it only lasts for one session. Other browsers come up almost immediately. Whats wrong??
